title: ‘Repainter’ app for custom Material You colors goes stable with better Samsung support, more
content:
Material You’s colors make Android 12 fun, but custom options aren’t built into the system. Repainter is a third-party app that adds that functionality, and with its stable release, the app is adding better support for Samsung devices on Android 12 and more.

more…

The post ‘Repainter’ app for custom Material You colors goes stable with better Samsung support, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Repainter is an app that takes advantage of Android 12's Material You colors with the option for custom colors and more, and now it's stable.
